io.spine.server.model

Class MessageHandlerMap<M extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,H extends HandlerMethod<?,M,?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.MessageHandlerMap<M,H>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of messages
    H - the type of handler methods
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Immutable(containerOf={"M","H"})
public class MessageHandlerMap<M extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,H extends HandlerMethod<?,M,?,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Provides mapping from a class of messages to a method which handles such messages.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageHandlerMap(java.lang.Class<?> cls, MethodFactory<H> factory)
      Creates a map of methods found in the passed class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsClass(M messageClass)
      Returns true if the handler map contains a method that handles the passed class of messages, false otherwise.
      java.util.Set<M> getMessageClasses()
      Obtains classes of messages for which handlers are stored in this map.
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<M> getMessageClasses(java.util.function.Predicate<H> predicate)
      Obtains classes of messages which handlers satisfy the passed predicate.
      H getMethod(HandlerKey handlerKey)
      Obtains the method for handling by the passed key.
      H getMethod(M messageClass)
      Obtains the method for handling by the passed message classes.
      H getMethod(M messageClass, io.spine.type.MessageClass originClass)
      Obtains the method for handling by the passed message and origin classes.

        cls - the class to inspect
        factory - the factory of methods

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageClasses

        public java.util.Set<M> getMessageClasses()
        Obtains classes of messages for which handlers are stored in this map.

      • containsClass

        public boolean containsClass(M messageClass)
        Returns true if the handler map contains a method that handles the passed class of messages, false otherwise.

      • getMessageClasses

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<M> getMessageClasses(java.util.function.Predicate<H> predicate)
        Obtains classes of messages which handlers satisfy the passed predicate.
        Parameters:
        predicate - a predicate for handler methods to filter the corresponding message classes

      • getMethod

        public H getMethod(HandlerKey handlerKey)
        Obtains the method for handling by the passed key.
        Parameters:
        handlerKey - the key of the handler to get
        Returns:
        a handler method
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no method found in the map

      • getMethod

        public H getMethod(M messageClass,
                   io.spine.type.MessageClass originClass)
        Obtains the method for handling by the passed message and origin classes.

        If there is no handler matching both the message and origin class, a handler will be searched by a message class only.

        Parameters:
        messageClass - the message class of the handled message
        originClass - the class of the message, from which the handled message is originate
        Returns:
        a handler method
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no method found in the map

      • getMethod

        public H getMethod(M messageClass)
        Obtains the method for handling by the passed message classes.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the message class of the handled message
        Returns:
        a handler method
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no method found in the map
